AcceptAgreementApprovalRequest.name: AcceptAgreementApprovalRequest
AcceptAgreementApprovalRequest.description:
Allows users to approve an incoming subscription request (for providers who provide
                                                products that require subscription verification).

AssociateProductsWithPrivateMarketplace.name: AssociateProductsWithPrivateMarketplace
AssociateProductsWithPrivateMarketplace.description:
Adds new approved products to the Private Marketplace. Also allows to approve a request
                                                for a product to be associated with the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed
                                                by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so,
                                                and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it.

BatchMeterUsage.name: BatchMeterUsage
BatchMeterUsage.description: Grants permission to post metering records for a set of customers for SaaS applications

CancelAgreementRequest.name: CancelAgreementRequest
CancelAgreementRequest.description:
Allows users to cancel pending subscription requests for products that require subscription
                                                verification.

CompleteTask.name: CompleteTask
CompleteTask.description: Complete an existing task and submit the content to the associated change.

CreatePrivateMarketplace.name: CreatePrivateMarketplace
CreatePrivateMarketplace.description:
Creates a Private Marketplace for the individual account, or for the entire AWS Organization
                                                if one exists. This action can only be performed by the master account if using an
                                                AWS Organization.

CreatePrivateMarketplaceRequests.name: CreatePrivateMarketplaceRequests
CreatePrivateMarketplaceRequests.description:
Creates a new request for a product or products to be associated with the Private
                                                Marketplace. This action can be performed by any account in an in an AWS Organization,
                                                provided the user has permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control
                                                Policies allow it.

DescribeBuilds.name: DescribeBuilds
DescribeBuilds.description: Describes Image Builds identified by a build Id

DescribeChangeSet.name: DescribeChangeSet
DescribeChangeSet.description: Returns the details of an existing change set.

DescribeEntity.name: DescribeEntity
DescribeEntity.description: Returns the details of an existing entity.

DescribePrivateMarketplaceRequests.name: DescribePrivateMarketplaceRequests
DescribePrivateMarketplaceRequests.description:
Describes requests and associated products in the Private Marketplace. This action
                                                can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions
                                                to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it.

DescribePrivateMarketplaceStatus.name: DescribePrivateMarketplaceStatus
DescribePrivateMarketplaceStatus.description:
Describes the status of the Private Marketplace for administrative purposes. This
                                                action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has
                                                permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it.

DescribeProcurementSystemConfiguration.name: DescribeProcurementSystemConfiguration
DescribeProcurementSystemConfiguration.description:
Describes the Procurement System integration configuration (e.g. Coupa) for the individual
                                                account, or for the entire AWS Organization if one exists. This action can only be
                                                performed by the master account if using an AWS Organization.

DescribeTask.name: DescribeTask
DescribeTask.description: Returns the details of an existing task.

DisassociateProductsFromPrivateMarketpla.name: DisassociateProductsFromPrivateMarketplace
DisassociateProductsFromPrivateMarketpla.description:
Removes approved products from the Private Marketplace. Also allows to decline a request
                                                for a product to be associated with the Private Marketplace. This action can be performed
                                                by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has permissions to do so,
                                                and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it.

GetAgreementApprovalRequest.name: GetAgreementApprovalRequest
GetAgreementApprovalRequest.description:
Allows users to view the details of their incoming subscription requests (for providers
                                                who provide products that require subscription verification).

GetAgreementRequest.name: GetAgreementRequest
GetAgreementRequest.description:
Allows users to view the details of their subscription requests for data products
                                                that require subscription verification.

GetAgreementTerms.name: GetAgreementTerms
GetAgreementTerms.description: Returns a list of terms for an agreement.

GetEntitlements.name: GetEntitlements
GetEntitlements.description:
Retrieves entitlement values for a given product. The results can be filtered based
                                                on customer identifier or product dimensions

ListAgreementApprovalRequests.name: ListAgreementApprovalRequests
ListAgreementApprovalRequests.description:
Allows users to list their incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide
                                                products that require subscription verification).

ListAgreementRequests.name: ListAgreementRequests
ListAgreementRequests.description:
Allows users to list their subscription requests for products that require subscription
                                                verification.

ListPrivateMarketplaceRequests.name: ListPrivateMarketplaceRequests
ListPrivateMarketplaceRequests.description:
Queryable list for requests and associated products in the Private Marketplace. This
                                                action can be performed by any account in an AWS Organization, provided the user has
                                                permissions to do so, and the Organization's Service Control Policies allow it.

MeterUsage.name: MeterUsage
MeterUsage.description: Grants permission to emit metering records

PutProcurementSystemConfiguration.name: PutProcurementSystemConfiguration
PutProcurementSystemConfiguration.description:
Creates or updates the Procurement System integration configuration (e.g. Coupa) for
                                                the individual account, or for the entire AWS Organization if one exists. This action
                                                can only be performed by the master account if using an AWS Organization.

RegisterUsage.name: RegisterUsage
RegisterUsage.description:
Grants permission to to verify that the customer running your paid software is subscribed
                                                to your product on AWS Marketplace, enabling you to guard against unauthorized use.
                                                Meters software use per ECS task, per hour, with usage prorated to the second

RejectAgreementApprovalRequest.name: RejectAgreementApprovalRequest
RejectAgreementApprovalRequest.description:
Allows users to decline an incoming subscription requests (for providers who provide
                                                products that require subscription verification).

ResolveCustomer.name: ResolveCustomer
ResolveCustomer.description:
Grants permission to resolve a registration token to obtain a CustomerIdentifier and
                                                product code

SearchAgreements.name: SearchAgreements
SearchAgreements.description: Allows users to search their agreements.

Subscribe.name: Subscribe
Subscribe.description:
Allows users to subscribe to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability to send
                                                a subscription request for products that require subscription verification. Includes
                                                the ability to enable auto-renewal for an existing subscription.

Unsubscribe.name: Unsubscribe
Unsubscribe.description:
Allows users to remove subscriptions to AWS Marketplace products. Includes the ability
                                                to disable auto-renewal for an existing subscription.

UpdateAgreementApprovalRequest.name: UpdateAgreementApprovalRequest
UpdateAgreementApprovalRequest.description:
Allows users to make changes to an incoming subscription request, including the ability
                                                to delete the prospective subscriber's information (for providers who provide products
                                                that require subscription verification).

UpdateTask.name: UpdateTask
UpdateTask.description: Update the content of an existing task.

ViewSubscriptions.name: ViewSubscriptions
ViewSubscriptions.description: Allows users to see their account's subscriptions.
